text: <@U22VBL87M> in this case i was cleaning up a dev portal and wanted to make sure there was no potential client dependencies... however i could see a case where a parent company owns multiple portals and has some data that was relevant to multiple sites

Hello All, I built an event listing using HubDb following this tutorial <https://www.smartbugmedia.com/blog/creating-event-listing-using-hubdb> and it works great on a dedicated events page but when i use the same module on the home page, it doesn’t remove a past event. Wondering if there’s a glitch?
Can u link me to your code via DM, i will take a look..
